ing.item: Shredded reduced fat cheddar cheese (1/2 c.)

directions.step:
Heat oven to 400. Spread 1/4 cup refried beans evenly onto each tortilla. Place 2 slices chicken and 2 tablespoons cheese down the center 1/3 of each tortilla; fold sides over filling. Place, folded side down, on an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake at 400 6-8 minutes or until throoughly heated. Serve topped with lettuce and salsa.
Per serving: 240 cal., 15g pro., 32g carb., 5g fiber, 6g fat, 19mg chol., 890mg sod., 180mg pot., 2 starch and 1 1/2 lean meat exchanges.
Fast and Healthy Jan/Feb 95 Typed by Carolyn Shaw 1-95
